features: Cooling pillow covers with Japanese Cool-to-Touch Tech fibers absorb body heat and enhance air circulation
Customizable comfort with zipper to add or remove foam fillings and adjust height and firmness
Aligns head, neck and spine with firm memory foam contouring to neck and guiding spine
Supportive and breathable open cell memory foam and poly fill blend is softer and more breathable than solid foam
Ideal for all sleep positions - remove fill for back sleepers, use as is for side sleepers, remove fill for stomach sleepers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good firm pillow
reviews.reviewText: The WISHSMILE Cooling King Size Pillows have significantly improved my sleep quality. The shredded memory foam provides excellent support, and the cooling feature is a game-changer, especially for hot sleepers. The adjustable firmness with the zipper allows me to customize the pillow to my preference, making it suitable for various sleep positions. The set of 2 pillows ensures consistency in comfort, and the generous 20x36 size adds a luxurious feel to my bed. The quality and attention to detail in design, coupled with the cooling technology, make these pillows a standout choice for anyone looking to enhance their sleep experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wanted pillows that I could customize the amount of fill/firmness. These pillows were exactly what I was looking for. After opening the box/packaging, the pillows were as flat as a pancake but once I threw them in the dryer for a short bit, they fluffed right up and felt firm. The first night I didn’t remove any fill because I wanted to try them out as they were. I realized after, that I would need to remove some fill because they were much too firm for me. I removed about 1/4 of the fill and now they are perfect. So happy I ordered these pillows and would recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great! Highly recommend. — strong initial smell
reviews.reviewText: (Pictures are after I removed the foam I didn’t need. I put a 6oz sunscreen spray bottle in the one picture for reference of how tall the pillow is after removing ABOUT 1/4th the foam).No extra foam included, but they are overly-filled with foam so they are quite thick and firm.I got it for my 4 year old and had to remove 3 gallon-sized ziplock bags worth - probably about 1/4th of the foam to get it thinner and safer for my young child.They were fully to size within maybe a few hours. They do come with a pretty strong smell - I haven’t tried the drier option yet; if they still smell strong tomorrow after 24 hours of airing out, then I’ll try the dryer option.They are very soft fabrics and soft squishy foam (the more foam you leave in, the firmer it is and the more you take out, the squishier it is). It does come with two zip pillowcases. The first one contains all the purple foam and is seemingly a basic zippered pillowcase. The 2nd one is the outer white/blue zippered casing that goes over the 1st casing. The 2nd casing is the soft/cooling one you see in the pictures and description.The white side is extra soft and the blue side is noticeably cooling (still soft but more of a slick soft vs the white is more plush soft)Things I would change:- less smell (I don’t mind that there is some smell initially, but it’s taking longer to dissipate than preferred and it is pretty strong)- wish it came with a large sealable bag to put the extra foam in for people that don’t want that thick or firm of a pillow. I used 3 gallon sized ziplock bags to remove estimated 1/4th of the foam best guess. Not absolutely necessary, but would be a nice touch.- maybe I missed the info, but I wish either the inner or the outer pillowcase was a ‘protector’ as in: waterproof, hypoallergenic, bedbug & dust mite protection. I’m probably going to order a true protector, remove the 2nd outer cooling casing, put on the actual protector, and then put the cooling cover on as a 3rd casing. I feel silly maybe having so many casings but the 1st is important to contain the foam, 2nd to protect the pillow, & 3rd to have the cooling & softness features. 🤷🏻‍♀️ it is what it is I guess.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy, dense pillow. Not too hard, not too soft. My husband runs hot at night and the cooling feature really helps. I’m usually cold, but it hasn’t been an issue. It was a bit dense and tall for me for about a month, but now it’s comfy and perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfection So Far
reviews.reviewText: Pillows have been a welcome addition to our bedding! Firm & CoolingWell worth the price!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are high quality and well constructed. But ultra ultra firm. When you lay on them very firm not fluffy at all. Yet after about thirty minutes the area your head is laying on is still very firm, yet almost flat with very little lift for your head. So, while I can say the actual construction and quality of pillows is good. For me it is not what I need for a comfortable sleep. Would return if I had good transport into town to do the return. So I am still in the market for a good sleeping pillow. I guess they are adjustable by removing some of the filling, but then they would not have enough lift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My husband likes a firmer pillow than I do so it was perfect for him. I loved that you can take some of the filling out to customize it to my liking. Wonderful idea!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These pillows are so comfy! The only thing is you have to remove the foam until you find the perfect comfort for you. Do not throw that foam away either! I recommend bagging it up and storing it away in case you wanna replace old foam or even change up the firmness of your pillow.

reviews.reviewTitle: Cool Comfort, Customized Support: A Brief Review of Cooling Shredded Memory Foam Pillows
reviews.reviewText: Upgrading to Cooling Shredded Memory Foam Pillows has been a game-changer for my sleep routine. The innovative shredded memory foam allows for optimal airflow, ensuring a consistently cool night's sleep. What sets these pillows apart is the adjustable loft, providing customizable support to suit individual preferences.The cooling properties are a standout feature. The breathable cover and shredded foam work together to regulate temperature, making them ideal for those who tend to sleep hot. The result is a refreshing sleep environment that enhances overall comfort.In terms of feel, the shredded memory foam contours well to the head and neck, promoting a restful sleep experience. These pillows maintain their shape over time, showcasing durability and quality construction.In summary, Cooling Shredded Memory Foam Pillows deliver on their promise of cool comfort and personalized support. If you're looking to upgrade your sleep quality, these pillows are a worthy investment for a refreshing and rejuvenating night's sleep.

They're well stuffed. If I were using it for my neck I would definitely take out some memory foam. I use the pillows to prop my back up in bed. They are firm yet they contour and you can also mold the shape to a certain extent. All in all, it's money worth spent. Oh and they are lavender scented but that goes away.

reviews.reviewTitle: Comfortable but not a cooling pillow
reviews.reviewText: The shredded memory foam is comfy enough. It’s firm but not hard. I tend to sink into it a bit but not a lot. Personally I find it stays this way all night. I’ve never felt the need to fluff it up through the night. I actually took a little of the filling out because I felt the pillow was just a bit too high. There was no extra filling provided.The pillows have a light scent along the lines of soap… maybe a lavender soap. It’s actually not a bad scent and it didn’t seem synthetic or chemical-like. The scent is fading day by day and barely noticeable how.I took the recommendation that came with the pillows and threw them in the drier after opening to fluff them up initially. It’s amazing to see how full these pillows get after being so compact in the box.I can’t say this is a cooling pillow. I’ve briefly tried more expensive cooling pillows and they seemed to just not warm up very quickly. The blue side of this pillow feels cool on initial touch but unfortunately it didn’t feel much different from my previous “normal” pillow not long after. I suppose it does cool off quickly when you change positions though.

I really like these pillows. They are extra firm and do not get flat. They are not cooling, but that's not why I bought them for. You can remove the foam to adjust them to your preference. Recommend them to side sleepers who love extra firm pillows.
I like them they are what i was looking for
